name: React
description: React is a JavaScript library for building interactive user interfaces, developed and mantained by Facebook.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is a client-side programming language commonly used in web development, that conforms to the ECMAScript specification.

name: NodeJS
description: Node.js is a server-side platform wrapped around the JavaScript language for building scalable, event-driven applications.

name: CSS
description: Cascading Style Sheets are used to format the layout of Web pages. They can be used to define text styles, table sizes, and other aspects of Web pages.

name: Web Dev
description: Learn more about Web Development theoretical and applied aspects. This category includes anything too generic to have its own.

name: MonoGame
description: MonoGame is a free C# game developing framework. It's an open-source implementation of the  Microsoft XNA 4 API.

name: PHP
description: PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor is an HTML-embedded Web scripting language. PHP is largely applied to Backend Development.

name: Problem Solving
description: The synthesized role of a programmer is to solve problems. Let's check some common problems and algorithms out.

name: Python
description: Python is a high-level Object Oriented programming language designed to be easy to read and simple to implement.

name: CS
description: Learn more about Computer Science. One subject to rule them all! Computer Science is the foundation of everything this blog is based on.

name: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript developed by Microsoft that adds static typing, classes, interfaces, generics, etc..
